• About Ida
  • Projects
  • Blog
  • Contact

  • Sextantworks

    Sextantworks practices transgressive placemaking and experiential gift design through generosity, location and intimacy.

  • Postcards in Solidarity

    Farmers from Guatemala and India exchange messages inspired by photographs of their communities which share a history of armed conflict and now practice fair trade agriculture.

  • American Realities

    The American Realities website is a media rich experience of documentary reporting on poverty in America.

  • Accused

    Accused is a browser-based game about wrongful conviction brought about by coercive police interrogation techniques designed for the Innocence Project.

  • Antidote Games

    Antidote Games is a design studio I co-founded to create playful experiences for understanding complex realities.

  • The Cupcake Machine

    The Cupcake Machine is a playful experience about an engineering marvel lost, revived and tragically broken again.

  • Google's Field Trip Day

    I produced the New York launch event for Google's Niantic Labs Field Trip app. The app turns any neighborhood into a museum with location based curated content.

  • Games For Change Festival

    For the 8th annual Games For Change festival, I managed 30 hours of programming, produced the event schedule, coached speakers and oversaw the production team, designer and event staff.

  • Jean-Claude Van Jam

    Jean-Claude Van Jam brought together game designers, artist and programmers to create games inspired by Jean-Claude Van Damme's expansive filmography.

  • Participatry Video Training

    I taught villagers in rural Ethiopia to make films about their efforts to mitigate the impact of climate change.
